phrs.translation: 触犯法律, 否定, 抵触, 触犯

sentences.sentence: Opponents said this would contravene international treaties.
sentences.translation: 反对者表示，这将违反国际条约。

sentences.sentence: The content of the settlement agreement shall not contravene the law.
sentences.translation: 调解协议的内容不得违反法律规定。

sentences.sentence: French publishers also claim the agreement will contravene laws in their homeland.
sentences.translation: 法国出版商也声称这项协议违背了法国法律。
